title: When will LG's 65-inch OLED rollable TV come out, and how much will it cost? - Quora

response.answer_text: LG's representatives confirmed at CES 2020 that their 65-inch OLED rollable TV would ship sometime in the second or third quarter of 2020. Although they also said that the US pricing isn't finalized, some sources say that it will start with the price of $60,000 (about £45,600 or AU$86,200).  Source: LG's roll-up OLED TV comes out of hiding only when TV time rolls around
